name: Ask At Bat Question Bot
description:
IAB-15657

As a user I would like to be able to ask At Bat to answer specific baseball stats queries such as:
Who led the league in ERA in 1975?
Who is the all time AL Steals Leader?
Who holds the single season record for On Base percentage?

The user should press a microphone button which would open up a sheet with a "capturing indicator" like Siri (a waveform animation indicating that it is listening)
As the user speaks, we would show text to translation
The answer would be provided with a link to the correct view in Stats to get a deeper answer
Error handling would be provided if it doesn't understand the query

https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=mobile&title=At+Bat+-+Question+Bot+-+Phase+1
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=SD&title=Stats+Leaders
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=55312411
http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams?sportId=1 (Team IDs)
